short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate and display video remaining time based on current playback speed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Video Time Tracker helps you calculate the remaining time of a video based on its current playback speed. It also displays the exact time when the video will finish, making it easier to plan your time.

Key Features:
- Calculates remaining video time dynamically based on playback speed.
- Displays the exact finish time in your local time zone.
- Works seamlessly with HTML5 video players, including YouTube and Vimeo.
- Clean and intuitive interface with spinning hourglass animation.

How to Use:
1. Open a video on any supported platform.
2. Click the Video Time Tracker icon in the Chrome toolbar.
3. View the remaining time and finish time directly in the popup.
